resources.string: Welcome to aShell: A local ADB shell for Shizuku powered android devices.
aShell is still working. Please wait for it to finish or manually stop (by clicking the stop button) to run a new command
aShell is still working. Do you want to stop the current process?
Do you want to quit aShell?
The output of last command is exported to \'%s\' folder
Access to Shizuku service is denied for aShell. aShell won\'t work without a proper Shizuku environment.
Shizuku is not installed or not properly configured on your device. aShell won\'t work without a proper Shizuku environment. Click here to learn more about Shizuku.
aShell is not designed for root-related uses. Aborting.
